en: Our github.io domain will be deprecated soon!
Please move over to our official domain to continue playing in the future! Transfer all of your progress by exporting your save and importing it on the official site.
Crafting this recipe will reduce the material cost to master it.
You have mastered this recipe. Its material cost has been removed, if any, and its higher rarity crafting chance has been doubled.
Select a recipe to unlock and learn permanently.
Completing shop orders allows you to gain new crafting recipes.
Mastering recipes provides you with bonuses such as no material cost and higher rarity chances.
Defeat the next boss to unlock more recipes.
There are no recipes available to master currently.
There are no recipes to unlock right now. Complete a shop order for the ability to unlock a new recipe
This shop order is empty. Select a recipe below to get a new order. You will need to defeat the next boss if no recipes are available.
Equip your hero with items from your inventory.
Equip your hero with trinkets from your inventory.
No equipment available to equip in this slot.
No trinkets available to equip in this slot.
Select an area for your heroes to explore.
You have successfully completed this adventure!
You have failed to complete this adventure. Try different hero combinations or gear!
Select the heroes to send on this adventure.
Select a quest for your heroes to partake in.
The heroes you have selected for this quest.
Select the heroes to send on this quest.
Unlock this building by crafting the recipe below.
Items in your inventory that can be used in the Synthesizer.
You currently have no items available for the synthesizer.
Use Essence to transform the stats on a piece of equipment.
Receive special Essence in exchange for lowering the rarity of a piece of equipment by one tier.
Items you currently have in your inventory.
Items you currently have stored in the bank.
You currently have no items in your inventory.
You currently have no items stored in the bank.
Use three of the same item to fuse into higher rarity.
You currently have no items available to fuse.
Items in your inventory that you can upgrade.
Items your heroes have equipped that you can upgrade.
You have no items in your inventory that can be upgraded using the forge.
This hero has no items equipped that can be upgraded using the forge.
You can offer up the following items for a fortune.
You currently have no items available to offer.
Research new trinket recipes that can be crafted for gold.
There are no more Trinket recipes available for research.
Your available Trinket recipes. They are always crafted at Epic rarity!
View your contribution details for each line.
Donate your items to earn crafting rewards.
You have no items available to donate.
Turn in 11 common, good, great, or epic items for bonuses to all {0} crafts
Donate items of the appropriate rarity and forge enhancement to contribute to the museum.
You have successfully contributed all requested variations for this recipe.
Perks you can purchase from the Market.
Perks you have already purchased from the Market.
Sell the Knife in your Inventory.
Unlock the hero Revere in the Market.
Unlock the adventure area Groovy Grove in the Market.
Send Revere on an adventure to start collecting materials.  Revere will stay in the dungeon until you cancel it.
Equip Revere with a Knife to make her stronger.
Purchase the Merchant Tab from the Market
Complete your first guild order by submitting 5 Knives.
Completed orders let you gain new recipes. Unlock the Bandit Mask recipe in Shop Orders.
Equip Revere with a Knife and Bandit Mask so she can clear Floor 2 of Groovy Grove. Higher floors gain material faster.
Continue completing orders until you unlock the Novice Cloak. If you need Bee Chunks, make sure Revere is adventuring.
The Novice Cloak takes a new material. Unlock the adventure area Spooky Spot in the Market.
Send an adventurer to the Spooky Spot to start collecting material and craft a Novice Cloak.
Meager sword requires a Weaponmaker worker to craft. Purchase one from the market and craft a Meager Sword.
Unlock Beorn to be able to adventure in two areas at once. Material not used in crafting can be used in mastering recipes.
Continue completing orders until you unlock the Earth Staff.
Earth Staff requires Earth Crystals from the Creepy Crag. Purchase Creepy Crag and start adventuring there and craft an Earth Staff.
Purchase Neve from the Market and run all three dungeons at once to collect materials.
Continue finishing shop orders until you unlock Metal Armor. Completing shop orders and equipping your heroes with better gear is one of the main progression goals.

Metal Armor requires the third type of worker to craft. Purchase an Armorer worker from the Market and craft a Metal Armor. If you're short on gold, continue selling your crafts you make and use the higher rarity ones to gear your heroes.
Purchase a second Crafting Slot from the Market. You won't be able to craft two of the same item yet without two workers of the same type, but more items is more gold!
Purchase Auto-Sell from the Market. This allows you to automatically sell crafts of a lower desired rarity. Hover over the crafting slot to see this option and autosell an item to proceed.
Master your first recipe. This is available in the merchant tab. Mastering a recipe will increase exceptional craft chances, and completely removes material costs.
Continue completing orders until you unlock Spells Vol I.
Spells Vol I requires the last worker type, a Jeweler Worker. Purchase one in the Market and craft a Spells Vol I.
Complete all the Level 1 Shop Orders and grab the last recipe, Lactuca.
You must defeat the boss to unlock more recipes. Time to gear up! Give all three of your heroes gear in all six slots.

Unlock the Boss Realm and slay the foe!  If you struggle with the boss, try giving your heroes stronger equipment and pay attention to the boss's skills (there's a "show enemy party" button in the party creation screen).
After defeating a boss, you'll unlock the next set of recipes. New recipes require new materials. Buy the Dungeon Levels perk from the market.
Send a team to Groovy Grove II to start collecting the next tier of material. You may need to abandon Groovy Grove I if someone is adventuring there.
Unlock the "More Shop Orders" perk from the Market. This allows you to have two shop orders at once, and it allows you to have some choice in which recipes to gain first.

Choose two level 2 recipes to fill your guild orders and end this tutorial. Pay attention to the materials for your choice! It's usually a good idea to have orders for a variety of materials. If you aren't collecting materials for the recipe you want to craft, change your adventuring parties to new dungeons!
